metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Tianjun dense soil moisture and Freeze–Thaw monitoring network in the Qinghai Lake Basin (QLB-NET)(2019-2023)
metadata.titleCn: 青海湖流域天峻高密度土壤水分和冻融监测传感器网络（QLB-NET）数据集（2019-2023）
metadata.description: This dataset contains observation data from the Tianjun dense soil moisture sensor network in the Qinghai Lake Basin (QLB-NET) from September 2019 to July 2023. QLB-NET is deployed within a range of 36 km x 40 km in the Tianjun area of the Qinghai Lake Basin in the northern part of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau (N36.9º, E98.96º-N37.61º, E99.336º), covering major soil moisture and freeze-thaw remote sensing product pixels such as EASE-GRID projection of 36 km×36 km (SMAP soil moisture and freeze-thaw products) and 25 km×25 km (SMOS, FY3, and AMSR-E soil moisture products, ESDR freeze-thaw product), and geographic Lat/Lon projection of 0.25º×0.25º(AMSR-2, ESA CCI soil moisture products). The terrain in this area is undulating and diverse, with underlying surface types mainly including alpine meadows (the proportion>90%), alpine swampy meadows, shrubs, wetlands, rivers, etc. QLB-NET consists of a microwave pixel scale network consisting of 60 observation sites, and two enhanced observation areas of 1 km x 1 km, each consisting of 11 observation sites. Each observation site includes three layers of soil moisture (cm³/ cm³), temperature (℃), and electrical conductivity (dS/m) observations at depths of 5cm, 10cm, and 30cm (sensor: CS655). The observation data collection period is 30 minutes, with 48 data per day, and missing data marked as -6999. The released observation data includes: date/time (TimeStamp), soil moisture (VWC5cm, VWC10cm, VWC30cm), soil temperature (TS-5cm, TS_10cm, TS-30cm), soil conductivity (EC-5cm, EC_10cm, EC-30cm), temperature inside the chassis (PTemp Avg), voltage (BattV Min); The data is stored in *. csv format.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包含了2019年9月至 2023年 7月的青海湖流域天峻高密度土壤水分和冻融监测传感器网络观测数据。该传感器网络布设在青藏高原北部青海湖流域天峻县36 km×40 km区域范围内（N36.9º, E98.96º—N37.61º, E99.336º），可完整覆盖EASE-GRID投影下36 km×36 km（如SMAP等土壤水分和冻融产品）、25 km×25 km （如SMOS、FY3、AMSR-E等土壤水分产品，ESDR等土壤冻融产品）、以及等经纬投影下0.25º×0.25º（如AMSR-2、ESA CCI等土壤水分产品）像元。该区域地势起伏大，地貌类型多样，下垫面类型主要包括高寒草甸（占比90%以上）、高寒沼泽性草甸、灌木、湿地、河流等。该传感器网络包含由60个节点组成的微波像元尺度网络和两个各由11个节点组成的1 km×1 km的加密观测区，每个节点包括5cm、10cm和30cm等3层土壤水分（单位：cm³/ cm³）、温度（单位：℃）和电导率（单位：dS/m）观测（传感器：CS655）。观测数据的周期为 30分钟，一天 48个数据，缺失数据标记为 -6999。所获取的土壤水分观测数据基于环刀取土烘干法的土壤水分进行了标定，以确保测量数据的准确性。发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间（TimeStamp）、土壤水分（VWC_5cm、VWC_10cm、VWC_30cm）、土壤温度（TS_5cm、TS _10cm、TS _30cm）、土壤电导率（EC_5cm、EC_10cm、EC_30cm）、机箱内温度（PTemp_Avg）、电压（BattV_Min），数据以 *.csv格式存储。

background: As essential variables in land–atmosphere feedbacks at weather and climatic time scales, soil moisture (SM) and soil freeze–thaw (FT) are two relatively active surface parameters that are interrelated and interinfluenced. Moreover, SM and FT are significant to the sustainable development of the regional and global water–land–air–plant–human nexus. In the context of global warming, these two parameters are essential for studying hydrothermal changes in the cryosphere. Their temporal and spatial dynamics can effectively reflect climate changes and substantially impact ecosystem health. The Global Climate Observation System (GCOS) program explicitly includes SM and FT as two Essential Climate Variables. The microwave remote sensing technique is one of the best ways to monitor regional/global SM and FT due to long-term, large-scale, and high-revisit observations, as well as the sensitivity to liquid water content and the capacity to penetrate clouds, rain, and vegetation.
research objective: This study aims to introduce the newly constructed QLB-NET in detail, including the site deployment strategy, the installation and maintenance, the sensor calibration, and the characteristics and quality of the in situ SM and ST measurements.
challenges: It remains a challenge to clarify the exact accuracies of different SM or FT products (Liu et al. 2021; Wang et al. 2020), especially under complex environmental conditions, which is not conducive to the further improvement of product quality and restricts their applications in related research areas. Moreover, it is also challenging for scaling research to obtain pixel-scale “true” values using relatively limited sites in a coarse-resolution grid.
methods: The QLB-NET was mainly accomplished during the autumn of 2019. At each site, SM, ST, and EC profiles are measured by Campbell CS655 sensors manufactured by Campbell (United States, www.campbellsci.com) at three different depths. We manually collect data and check the status of each site once a year at the beginning of September (before the soil starts freezing) since most of the area is not covered by wireless communication signals. To calibrate the sensor, we took 109 undisturbed ring-knife soil samples at a 10-cm depth from different sites in September 2019 and July 2020 to obtain the true SM values from the mass difference between the fresh and corresponding dried soil samples.
dataset: The QLB-NET is characterized by densely distributed in situ sites (82 sites) measuring SM and ST at 5-, 10-, and 30-cm depths, with 60 sites in a large-scale network covering an area of 36 km × 40 km and 22 sites evenly distributed across two small-scale 1 km × 1 km networks.
findings: Quantitative analyses of the in situ measurements show that the QLB-NET can provide stable and reliable ground truth for SM and FT over coarse grid scales, e.g., 36 km × 36 km, 25 km × 25 km, and 0.25° × 0.25°. The ground freeze–thaw state can be correctly identified with high probabilities ranging from 85.3% to 100% on two freeze–thaw transitional dates.
backgroundCn: 作为天气和气候时间尺度上陆地-大气反馈的重要变量，土壤湿度（SM）和土壤冻结-融化（FT）是两个相对活跃的表面参数，它们相互关联并相互影响。此外，SM和FT对区域和全球水-土地-空气-植物-人类关系的可持续发展具有重要意义。在全球变暖的背景下，这两个参数对于研究冰冻圈的水热变化至关重要。它们的时间和空间动态能够有效反映气候变化，并对生态系统健康产生重大影响。全球气候观察系统（GCOS）计划明确将SM和FT列为两个基本气候变量。微波遥感技术是监测区域/全球SM和FT的最佳方法之一，因为它具有长期、大规模和高重访观测的优势，以及对液态水含量的敏感性，能够穿透云层、降雨和植被。
research objectiveCn: 本研究旨在详细介绍新构建的QLB-NET，包括现场部署策略、安装和维护、传感器校准，以及原位土壤湿度（SM）和土壤温度（ST）测量的特性和质量。
challengesCn: 不同的SM或FT产品的准确性仍然难以明确（Liu et al. 2021; Wang et al. 2020），特别是在复杂的环境条件下，这不利于产品质量的进一步提升，并限制了它们在相关研究领域的应用。此外，利用相对有限的站点在粗分辨率网格中获取像素级“真实”值的研究也面临挑战。
methodsCn: QLB-NET主要是在2019年秋季完成的。在每个站点，使用美国Campbell公司（www.campbellsci.com）制造的CS655传感器在三个不同深度测量土壤水分（SM）、土壤温度（ST）和电导率（EC）剖面。由于大部分地区没有无线通信信号，我们每年在九月初（土壤开始结冰之前）手动收集数据并检查每个站点的状态。为了校准传感器，我们在2019年9月和2020年7月从不同站点以10厘米深度采集了109个未扰动的环刀土壤样本，以通过新鲜土壤样本与相应干燥土壤样本之间的质量差异获得真实的土壤水分值。
datasetCn: QLB-NET的特点是密集分布的原位站点（82个站点），在5厘米、10厘米和30厘米深度测量土壤湿度（SM）和土壤温度（ST），其中60个站点位于一个覆盖36公里×40公里区域的大规模网络中，22个站点均匀分布在两个小规模的1公里×1公里网络中。
findingsCn: 定量分析的原位测量表明，QLB-NET可以为粗网格尺度（例如36 km × 36 km、25 km × 25 km和0.25° × 0.25°）提供稳定可靠的地面真值。地面冻结-融化状态可以在两个冻结-融化过渡日期上以85.3%到100%的高概率正确识别。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the challenge of obtaining pixel-scale 'true' values from a limited number of sites affect the accuracy of soil moisture or freeze-thaw products?
Verification.QuestionCn: 从有限数量的地点获取像素级“真实”值的挑战是否会影响土壤湿度或冻融产品的准确性？

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the sensor network provide reliable ground truth for soil moisture and freeze-thaw status over coarse grid scales, such as 36 km × 36 km?
Verification.QuestionCn: 传感器网络能否在粗糙的网格尺度上（如36公里 × 36公里）提供可靠的土壤湿度和冻融状态的真实数据？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the calibration of soil moisture sensors based on ring-knife soil sampling, statistical modeling, or another method?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度传感器的校准是基于环刀土壤取样、统计建模还是其他方法？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are challenges in obtaining accurate soil moisture and freeze-thaw data primarily due to complex environmental conditions, sensor limitations, or data processing techniques?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 获取准确的土壤湿度和冻融数据的挑战主要是由于复杂的环境条件、传感器限制或数据处理技术吗？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is a significant challenge in validating soil moisture and freeze-thaw products under complex environmental conditions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下验证土壤湿度和冻融产品的一个重大挑战是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who manufactures the sensors used for measuring soil moisture, temperature, and electrical conductivity in the monitoring network?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 谁制造用于监测网络中测量土壤湿度、温度和电导率的传感器？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the QLB-NET sensor network deployed for monitoring soil moisture and freeze-thaw states?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: QLB-NET传感器网络部署在监测土壤湿度和冻融状态的地方。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to monitor soil moisture and soil freeze-thaw cycles in remote areas without reliable wireless communication?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于监测偏远地区土壤湿度和土壤冻融循环，而这些地方没有可靠的无线通信？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves using Campbell CS655 sensors to measure soil moisture, soil temperature, and electrical conductivity at three different depths. Data is manually collected and site status is checked once a year at the beginning of September, as most areas are not covered by wireless communication signals.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及使用Campbell CS655传感器在三个不同深度测量土壤湿度、土壤温度和电导率。数据是手动收集的，现场状态每年在九月初检查一次，因为大多数地区没有无线通信信号覆盖。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when attempting to clarify the accuracy of soil moisture or freeze-thaw products under complex environmental conditions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下，尝试澄清土壤湿度或冻融产品的准确性时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge is clarifying the exact accuracies of different soil moisture or freeze-thaw products, especially under complex environmental conditions, which affects product quality improvement and restricts their applications in related research areas.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是澄清不同土壤湿度或冻融产品在复杂环境条件下的准确性，这影响了产品质量的提升，并限制了它们在相关研究领域的应用。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you give an example of a dataset characterized by densely distributed in situ sites for measuring soil moisture and soil temperature at multiple depths?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例数据集，该数据集以密集分布的原位站点为特征，用于测量多个深度的土壤湿度和土壤温度？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset characterized by densely distributed in situ sites includes 82 sites measuring soil moisture and soil temperature at 5-, 10-, and 30-cm depths, with 60 sites in a large-scale network covering a 36 km × 40 km area, and 22 sites evenly distributed across two small-scale 1 km × 1 km networks.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个特征为密集分布的原位站点的数据集包括82个站点，测量5厘米、10厘米和30厘米深度的土壤湿度和土壤温度，其中60个站点位于一个覆盖36公里 × 40公里区域的大规模网络中，22个站点均匀分布在两个小规模的1公里 × 1公里网络中。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced in obtaining accurate soil moisture and freeze-thaw data under complex environmental conditions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下获取准确的土壤湿度和冻融数据面临哪些挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: precise accuracies, complex environmental conditions, pixel-scale 'true' values, coarse-resolution grid
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 精确的准确性、复杂的环境条件、像素级“真实”值、粗分辨率网格

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to ensure the accuracy of soil moisture measurements in sensor networks?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在传感器网络中，确保土壤湿度测量准确性的方法包括哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: calibration method using undisturbed ring-knife soil samples at a 10-cm depth, true soil moisture values from mass difference between fresh and dried soil samples
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 使用未扰动环刀土壤样品在10厘米深度进行校准方法，真实土壤水分值来自新鲜和干燥土壤样品之间的质量差异。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many nodes are included in the sensor network for soil moisture and freeze-thaw monitoring in a densely distributed area?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在密集分布区域中，土壤湿度和冻融监测的传感器网络包含多少个节点？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many undisturbed soil samples were collected for sensor calibration from different sites?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 从不同地点收集了多少个未扰动的土壤样本用于传感器校准？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'pixel-scale true values' in the context of soil moisture and freeze-thaw monitoring?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在土壤湿度和冻融监测的背景下，“像素尺度真实值”是指在特定像素区域内测量的土壤湿度或冻融状态的实际值。这些值通常是通过地面观测或高分辨率遥感数据获得的，代表了该区域内的真实情况。
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Pixel-scale true values' refer to the accurate soil moisture and freeze-thaw measurements that represent the actual conditions at a specific pixel size on a coarse-resolution grid. Obtaining these values is challenging due to the limited number of measurement sites within a larger grid area.
Definition.AnswerCn: “像素尺度真实值”是指在粗分辨率网格上，代表特定像素大小的实际土壤湿度和冻融测量的准确值。由于在较大网格区域内测量站点数量有限，获取这些值具有挑战性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods for soil moisture and freeze-thaw sensors in high-altitude regions compare to those used in low-altitude regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 高海拔地区的土壤湿度和冻融传感器的数据收集方法与低海拔地区的相比有什么不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In the high-altitude region of Qinghai Lake Basin, data collection involves using a dense network of sensors distributed across varying terrains to measure soil moisture at different depths. Calibration is performed using undisturbed soil samples to ensure accuracy. The region's lack of wireless communication necessitates annual manual data collection and site checks. In low-altitude regions, the methods may differ due to more accessible environments and possibly more frequent data transmission capabilities.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在青海湖盆地的高海拔地区，数据收集涉及在不同地形上分布的密集传感器网络，以测量不同深度的土壤湿度。通过使用未扰动的土壤样本进行校准，以确保准确性。该地区缺乏无线通信， necessitates 每年进行手动数据收集和现场检查。在低海拔地区，由于环境更易接近，可能具有更频繁的数据传输能力，因此方法可能会有所不同。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn from the variations in soil moisture and freeze-thaw data collected at different depths and sites within a high-altitude region like the Qinghai Lake Basin?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在像青海湖盆地这样的高海拔地区，不同深度和地点收集的土壤湿度和冻融数据的变化可以得出哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The variations in soil moisture and freeze-thaw data collected at different depths and sites can provide insights into the temporal and spatial dynamics of soil moisture and freeze-thaw processes, reflecting climate changes and impacts on ecosystem health. The data can also help identify the ground freeze-thaw state with high probabilities, thus contributing to the understanding of hydrothermal changes in the cryosphere under global warming.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在不同深度和地点收集的土壤湿度和冻融数据的变化，可以提供土壤湿度和冻融过程的时间和空间动态的洞察，反映气候变化及其对生态系统健康的影响。这些数据还可以帮助识别高概率的地面冻融状态，从而有助于理解全球变暖下冰冻圈的水热变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the challenges of obtaining accurate soil moisture and freeze-thaw measurements in complex environmental conditions influence the interpretation of large-scale climate data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下获取准确的土壤湿度和冻融测量的挑战，可能会影响对大规模气候数据的解读。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in obtaining accurate measurements in complex conditions can influence the interpretation of large-scale climate data by restricting the accuracy and quality of soil moisture and freeze-thaw products. This limitation can affect the reliability of scaling research, where obtaining pixel-scale 'true' values is difficult, thus impacting the application of these datasets in regional and global climate models.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在复杂条件下获取准确测量的挑战可能会影响大规模气候数据的解释，因为这限制了土壤湿度和冻融产品的准确性和质量。这一限制可能会影响缩放研究的可靠性，因为获取像素级的“真实”值是困难的，从而影响这些数据集在区域和全球气候模型中的应用。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methodological considerations are necessary when deploying a sensor network for soil moisture and freeze-thaw monitoring in regions lacking wireless communication signals?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在缺乏无线通信信号的地区部署土壤湿度和冻融监测传感器网络时，需要考虑哪些方法论方面的因素？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Methodological considerations include manually collecting data and checking site status annually to ensure data integrity, especially before freezing periods. Sensor calibration is crucial, using undisturbed soil samples to ensure accurate soil moisture readings. Dense distribution of in situ sites and selecting appropriate sensor depths are also important to capture comprehensive data across varying environmental conditions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 方法论考虑包括手动收集数据和每年检查站点状态，以确保数据的完整性，特别是在冻结期之前。传感器校准至关重要，使用未干扰的土壤样本以确保土壤湿度读数的准确性。密集分布的原位站点和选择适当的传感器深度也很重要，以便在不同的环境条件下捕获全面的数据。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes difficulties in accurately determining soil moisture and soil freeze-thaw states under complex environmental conditions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下，准确确定土壤湿度和土壤冻融状态的困难原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: It remains a challenge to clarify the exact accuracies of different soil moisture or freeze-thaw products, especially under complex environmental conditions, which is not conducive to the further improvement of product quality and restricts their applications in related research areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在复杂的环境条件下，明确不同土壤湿度或冻融产品的准确性仍然是一个挑战，这不利于产品质量的进一步提升，并限制了它们在相关研究领域的应用。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is manual data collection and site status checking necessary in regions not covered by wireless communication signals?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在没有无线通信信号覆盖的地区，手动数据收集和现场状态检查是必要的。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Manual data collection and site status checking are necessary because most of the area is not covered by wireless communication signals, necessitating a manual check of the status of each site once a year at the beginning of September (before the soil starts freezing).
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 手动数据收集和现场状态检查是必要的，因为大部分区域没有无线通信信号覆盖，因此需要在每年的九月初（在土壤开始结冰之前）对每个站点的状态进行一次手动检查。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What reasons underlie the need for sensor calibration using undisturbed ring-knife soil samples?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用未扰动的环刀土壤样本进行传感器校准的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Sensor calibration using undisturbed ring-knife soil samples is needed to obtain the true soil moisture values from the mass difference between the fresh and corresponding dried soil samples, ensuring the accuracy of the soil moisture measurements.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用未扰动的环刀土壤样本进行传感器校准是必要的，以通过新鲜土壤样本与相应干燥土壤样本之间的质量差异获得真实的土壤湿度值，从而确保土壤湿度测量的准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What consequences might arise from deploying a high-density sensor network in a complex terrain for monitoring soil moisture and freeze-thaw cycles?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在复杂地形中部署高密度传感器网络以监测土壤湿度和冻融循环可能会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Deploying a high-density sensor network in a complex terrain, such as the one in the Qinghai Lake Basin, allows for detailed spatial and temporal monitoring of soil moisture and freeze-thaw cycles. This results in stable and reliable ground truth data that can improve the accuracy of regional and global climate models. However, it also poses challenges in terms of data collection and sensor maintenance, especially in remote areas lacking wireless communication signals.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在复杂地形（如青海湖盆地）中部署高密度传感器网络，可以对土壤湿度和冻融循环进行详细的空间和时间监测。这将产生稳定可靠的真实数据，从而提高区域和全球气候模型的准确性。然而，这也在数据收集和传感器维护方面带来了挑战，特别是在缺乏无线通信信号的偏远地区。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the calibration of sensors using the ring-knife soil sampling method affect the quality and reliability of soil moisture data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 传感器使用环刀土壤取样法进行校准如何影响土壤湿度数据的质量和可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Calibration of sensors using the ring-knife soil sampling method ensures that the soil moisture measurements reflect true values. This method involves obtaining undisturbed soil samples and measuring the mass difference between fresh and dried samples. This calibration process enhances the accuracy and reliability of the soil moisture data collected by the sensors, which is crucial for assessing climate change impacts and ecosystem health.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 传感器的校准采用环刀土壤取样法，确保土壤湿度测量反映真实值。该方法涉及获取未扰动的土壤样本，并测量新鲜样本与干燥样本之间的质量差异。此校准过程提高了传感器收集的土壤湿度数据的准确性和可靠性，这对于评估气候变化影响和生态系统健康至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of limited site availability on the accuracy of large-scale soil moisture and freeze-thaw products?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 有限的站点可用性对大规模土壤湿度和冻融产品的准确性可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Limited site availability can restrict the ability to obtain 'true' values at a pixel scale, which affects the accuracy of large-scale soil moisture and freeze-thaw products. This limitation poses challenges for scaling research, as it may result in less accurate validation and improvement of these products, particularly under complex environmental conditions. Consequently, it could hinder the application of such datasets in related research areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 有限的站点可用性可能限制在像素尺度上获得“真实”值的能力，这影响了大规模土壤湿度和冻融产品的准确性。这一限制给研究的扩展带来了挑战，因为它可能导致这些产品的验证和改进不够准确，特别是在复杂的环境条件下。因此，这可能会妨碍相关研究领域中这些数据集的应用。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to establish a sensor network for monitoring soil moisture and freeze–thaw processes in the Qinghai Lake Basin region?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在青海湖盆地地区建立土壤湿度和冻融过程监测传感器网络的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to provide stable and reliable ground truth data for soil moisture and freeze–thaw processes, which are essential variables in land–atmosphere feedbacks and significant for studying hydrothermal changes in the cryosphere. These processes are crucial for understanding ecosystem health and the sustainable development of the regional and global water–land–air–plant–human nexus.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是提供稳定可靠的土壤湿度和冻融过程的真实数据，这些变量在陆地-大气反馈中至关重要，并且对于研究冰冻圈中的水热变化具有重要意义。这些过程对于理解生态系统健康以及区域和全球水-土地-空气-植物-人类关系的可持续发展至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind the deployment of a dense in situ sensor network in areas with complex environmental conditions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下部署密集的原位传感器网络的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives include overcoming challenges in obtaining accurate soil moisture or freeze–thaw products under complex environmental conditions, which restricts the improvement and application of these products. The dense network aims to provide accurate pixel-scale 'true' values and improve the quality of related research in these areas.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括克服在复杂环境条件下获取准确土壤湿度或冻融产品的挑战，这限制了这些产品的改进和应用。密集的网络旨在提供准确的像素级“真实”值，并提高相关研究在这些领域的质量。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to ensure the accuracy and reliability of soil moisture and freeze-thaw data collected in regions with complex environmental conditions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下，确保收集的土壤湿度和冻融数据的准确性和可靠性所采用的方法论有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection involves using Campbell CS655 sensors at different depths, with manual data collection and site checks once a year. To ensure accuracy, sensors are calibrated using the ring-knife soil sampling method, where samples are taken to obtain true soil moisture values from the mass difference between fresh and dried samples.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及在不同深度使用Campbell CS655传感器，每年进行一次手动数据收集和现场检查。为了确保准确性，传感器使用环刀土壤取样法进行校准，通过取样获得新鲜样品和干燥样品之间的质量差异来获取真实的土壤湿度值。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the installation and maintenance of sensor networks managed in areas lacking wireless communication signals, and what procedures are involved?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在缺乏无线通信信号的地区，传感器网络的安装和维护是如何管理的，以及涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In areas not covered by wireless communication signals, data is manually collected, and the status of each sensor site is checked annually at the beginning of September before soil freezing. This involves visiting each site to ensure the sensors are functioning properly and collecting data accurately.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在没有无线通信信号覆盖的区域，数据是手动收集的，每个传感器站点的状态在每年九月初土壤冻结之前进行检查。这涉及到访问每个站点，以确保传感器正常工作并准确收集数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the deployment and maintenance of a sensor network for monitoring soil moisture and freeze-thaw states in remote areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在偏远地区部署和维护土壤湿度和冻融状态监测传感器网络成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The microwave remote sensing technique is a significant advancement, providing long-term, large-scale observations and sensitivity to liquid water content, which is crucial for monitoring soil moisture and freeze-thaw states. The deployment of Campbell CS655 sensors at different depths also facilitates detailed measurements.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 微波遥感技术是一项重要的进展，提供了长期、大规模的观测，并对液态水含量具有敏感性，这对于监测土壤湿度和冻融状态至关重要。在不同深度部署的Campbell CS655传感器也有助于进行详细的测量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the calibration of sensors using undisturbed soil samples enable accurate soil moisture data collection in complex environments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 传感器通过使用未扰动土壤样本进行校准，可以在复杂环境中实现准确的土壤湿度数据收集。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Calibrating sensors with undisturbed ring-knife soil samples allows for obtaining true soil moisture values by measuring the mass difference between fresh and dried samples. This method ensures that the sensor measurements are accurate and reliable, even in complex environmental conditions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用未扰动的环刀土壤样本来校准传感器，可以通过测量新鲜样本和干燥样本之间的质量差异来获得真实的土壤湿度值。这种方法确保了传感器测量的准确性和可靠性，即使在复杂的环境条件下。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions and strategies enable effective data collection in regions with limited wireless communication signals?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件和策略能够在无线通信信号有限的地区有效收集数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Manually collecting data and checking sensor status once a year, especially before the soil starts freezing, enables effective data collection in regions lacking wireless communication signals. This approach ensures that the data integrity and sensor functionality are maintained over time.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 每年手动收集数据并检查传感器状态，特别是在土壤开始冻结之前，可以有效地收集数据，尤其是在缺乏无线通信信号的地区。这种方法确保了数据的完整性和传感器功能的长期维护。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the calibration process for soil moisture sensors not yield expected accuracy in complex environmental conditions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度传感器的校准过程在复杂环境条件下可能无法达到预期的准确性，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It remains a challenge to clarify the exact accuracies of different SM or FT products under complex environmental conditions, which can hinder the improvement of product quality and restrict their applications in related research areas.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在复杂环境条件下，明确不同SM或FT产品的准确性仍然是一个挑战，这可能会妨碍产品质量的提升，并限制它们在相关研究领域的应用。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why do challenges arise in obtaining 'true' pixel-scale soil moisture values when using limited sites in a coarse-resolution grid?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用有限站点在粗分辨率网格中获取“真实”像素尺度土壤湿度值时，为什么会出现挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is challenging for scaling research to obtain pixel-scale 'true' values using relatively limited sites in a coarse-resolution grid, which may not accurately represent the broader environmental conditions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在较粗分辨率的网格中，使用相对有限的站点获取像素级的“真实”值是具有挑战性的，这可能无法准确代表更广泛的环境条件。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a densely distributed in situ network be expected to provide reliable ground truth for soil moisture and freeze-thaw states over coarse grid scales?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么密集分布的原位网络预计能够在粗网格尺度上提供可靠的土壤湿度和冻融状态的真实数据？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Quantitative analyses of the in situ measurements show that a densely distributed network can provide stable and reliable ground truth for SM and FT over coarse grid scales, with high probabilities of correctly identifying ground freeze–thaw states.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 定量分析的原位测量表明，密集分布的网络可以在粗网格尺度上提供稳定可靠的土壤湿度和冻融状态的真实数据，具有高概率正确识别地面冻融状态。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How can the data collection methods used in a sensor network for soil moisture and freeze-thaw monitoring be evaluated for their effectiveness and reliability?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估用于土壤湿度和冻融监测的传感器网络中的数据收集方法的有效性和可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness and reliability of the data collection methods can be evaluated through the detailed introduction of deployment strategy, sensor calibration, and maintenance described. The use of Campbell CS655 sensors at varying depths and the manual annual checks for sensor status contribute to the robustness of the data. Additionally, the calibration process involving undisturbed soil samples ensures accuracy in soil moisture measurements.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法的有效性和可靠性可以通过详细介绍部署策略、传感器校准和维护来评估。使用Campbell CS655传感器在不同深度进行测量，以及每年手动检查传感器状态，增强了数据的可靠性。此外，涉及未扰动土壤样本的校准过程确保了土壤湿度测量的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with obtaining accurate soil moisture and freeze-thaw data in complex environmental conditions, and how might these affect future research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在复杂环境条件下获取准确的土壤湿度和冻融数据面临哪些挑战，这些挑战可能如何影响未来的研究？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Challenges include clarifying the accuracies of different soil moisture or freeze-thaw products under complex environmental conditions, which may hinder the improvement of product quality and restrict application in research. The difficulty in obtaining pixel-scale true values using limited sites in coarse-resolution grids further complicates data accuracy, affecting future research by potentially limiting the development of more precise models and analyses.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 挑战包括在复杂环境条件下澄清不同土壤湿度或冻融产品的准确性，这可能阻碍产品质量的提升，并限制其在研究中的应用。由于在粗分辨率网格中仅有有限站点，获取像素级真实值的难度进一步复杂化了数据的准确性，这可能影响未来的研究，限制更精确模型和分析的发展。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about how datasets can accurately reflect soil freeze-thaw conditions in large-scale monitoring over diverse terrain.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定数据集如何能够准确反映大规模监测中不同地形的土壤冻融条件。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The dataset is derived from a dense network of sites measuring soil moisture and temperature at multiple depths, which allows for accurate characterization of freeze-thaw conditions. This is achieved through the spatial distribution of 82 sites covering large and small-scale networks, ensuring comprehensive data capture.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该数据集来源于一个密集的站点网络，测量多个深度的土壤湿度和温度，从而准确表征冻融条件。这是通过覆盖大规模和小规模网络的82个站点的空间分布实现的，确保了全面的数据捕获。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand how challenges in scaling research are addressed when using relatively limited observation sites to obtain pixel-scale 'true' values for coarse-resolution grids.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在使用相对有限的观测站点获取粗分辨率网格的像素级“真实”值时，如何解决研究规模扩展中的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges in scaling research are addressed by deploying a high-density sensor network that provides ground truth data at multiple scales, which helps to validate and improve the accuracy of coarse-resolution grid products by providing detailed in situ measurements across different terrain types and conditions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在扩展研究中面临的挑战通过部署高密度传感器网络得到解决，该网络在多个尺度上提供真实数据，这有助于通过在不同地形类型和条件下提供详细的现场测量来验证和提高粗分辨率网格产品的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify the challenges faced in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of soil moisture and freeze-thaw data in complex environmental conditions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 识别在复杂环境条件下确保土壤湿度和冻融数据的准确性和可靠性所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include determining the exact accuracies of different soil moisture or freeze-thaw products, particularly under complex environmental conditions, which can hinder product quality improvement and restrict application in research. Additionally, obtaining pixel-scale 'true' values for scaling research with limited sites in a coarse-resolution grid is challenging.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括在复杂环境条件下确定不同土壤湿度或冻融产品的准确性，这可能会妨碍产品质量的提升，并限制其在研究中的应用。此外，获取像素级的“真实”值以便在有限地点的粗分辨率网格上进行研究缩放也是一项挑战。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential datasets that could be developed to enhance the understanding of soil moisture and freeze-thaw dynamics in high-altitude ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探索可以开发的潜在数据集，以增强对高海拔生态系统中土壤湿度和冻融动态的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets could include expanded in situ measurements across more varied terrain types, incorporating additional sensor data for increased spatial and temporal coverage. Enhancing calibration methods with more frequent soil sample collection could improve data accuracy. A dataset integrating remote sensing products with in situ measurements could offer comprehensive insights into soil moisture and freeze-thaw dynamics at multiple scales.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集可以包括在更多样化地形类型上扩展的原位测量，结合额外的传感器数据以增加空间和时间覆盖范围。通过更频繁的土壤样本采集来增强校准方法可以提高数据的准确性。一个将遥感产品与原位测量相结合的数据集可以在多个尺度上提供关于土壤湿度和冻融动态的全面见解。
